properties.name: role
properties.description: The professional role or position of the speaker within their organization.
example_values: Director Methods Center for Causal Inference
possible_values: Director of the Defense of Political Sciences Department
Director Methods Center for Causal Inference

properties.name: research_focus_area
properties.description: The primary topical subjects or domains of research the speaker works on.

properties.name: primary_research_methods
properties.description: The main research methodologies or techniques frequently applied by the speaker.
example_values: qualitative interviewing, social media analytics, surveys
mostly quantitative (existing data or collecting primary data)
causal inference techniques (difference-in-difference, synthetic control methods)

properties.name: ai_tools_used
properties.description: Specific AI tools or platforms the speaker has used.

properties.name: ai_use_cases_actual
properties.description: Specific tasks or applications for which the speaker has actually used AI tools.
example_values: meeting minutes, key decisions, action items

properties.name: ai_use_cases_desired
properties.description: Specific tasks or applications for which the speaker wishes AI tools could be used, or where they see potential for future AI application.
example_values: analyzing qualitative data and pulling out themes
automating project management (Gantt charts, IRB review, variable naming, data dictionary, descriptives, missing data)

properties.name: ai_concerns
properties.description: Worries or ethical considerations expressed by the speaker regarding the use or adoption of AI.
example_values: RAND being put out of business by AI companies

properties.name: ai_adoption_at_rand_perception
properties.description: The speaker's perception of the current state or pace of AI adoption within RAND.

properties.name: ai_training_needs
properties.description: Suggestions or requests for training, education, or support to improve AI understanding and adoption at RAND.
example_values: working with IRB on AI implications

properties.name: experience_at_rand_years
properties.description: The length of time the speaker has been working at RAND.
